verses.text: And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* instead of \w Coniah|strong="H3659"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*, whom \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* made \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

But neither he, nor his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, nor the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, did \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*.\f + \fr 37.2 \ft by…: Heb. by the hand of the prophet\f*

And \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehucal|strong="H3081"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w* and \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* to the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Pray|strong="H6419"\w* now unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* for us.

Now \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for they had not \w put|strong="H5414"\w* him into \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.

Then \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* was come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and when the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* that \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w tidings|strong="H8088"\w* of them, they \w departed|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you unto me to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of me; Behold, \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, which is come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w help|strong="H5833"\w* you, shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* into their own \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* shall come \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3920"\w* it, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w Deceive|strong="H5377"\w* not \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H1980"\w* \w depart|strong="H3212"\w* from us: for they shall not \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 37.9 \ft yourselves: Heb. your souls\f*

For though ye had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* the whole \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* that \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against you, and there \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \add but\add* \w wounded|strong="H1856"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* among them, \add yet\add* should they rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 37.10 \ft wounded: Heb. thrust through\f*

¶ And it came to pass, that when the \w army|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* was broken \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* for \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w*,\f + \fr 37.11 \ft broken…: Heb. made to ascend\f*

Then \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, to \w separate|strong="H2505"\w* himself thence in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 37.12 \ft separate…: or, to slip away from thence in the midst of the people\f*

And when he was in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, a \w captain|strong="H1167"\w* of the \w ward|strong="H6488"\w* \add was\add* there, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Irijah|strong="H3376"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*; and he \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou fallest \w away|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \add It is\add* \w false|strong="H8267"\w*; I fall not \w away|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*. But he \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not to him: so \w Irijah|strong="H3376"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.\f + \fr 37.14 \ft false: Heb. falsehood, or, a lie\f*

Wherefore the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* were \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* him in \w prison|strong="H0612"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*: for they had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* that the \w prison|strong="H3608"\w*.

¶ When \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* was \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w dungeon|strong="H1004"\w*, and into the \w cabins|strong="H2588"\w*, and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* had \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* there \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*;\f + \fr 37.16 \ft cabins: or, cells\f*

Then \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and took him \w out|strong="H3947"\w*: and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* him \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Is there \add any\add* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? And \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, There \w is|strong="H3426"\w*: for, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he, thou shalt be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

Moreover \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, What have I \w offended|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, or against thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, or against this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that ye have \w put|strong="H5414"\w* me in \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*?

Where \add are\add* \w now|strong="H0346"\w* your \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* which \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* unto you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against you, nor against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*?

Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* now, I pray thee, O my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: let my \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*, I pray thee, be \w accepted|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; that thou cause me not to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, lest I \w die|strong="H4191"\w* there.\f + \fr 37.20 \ft let…: Heb. let my supplication fall\f*

Then \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* that they should \w commit|strong="H6485"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* into the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*, and that they should \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* a \w piece|strong="H3603"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* out of the \w bakers’|strong="H0644"\w* \w street|strong="H2351"\w*, until all the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* were \w spent|strong="H8552"\w*. Thus \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*.
